title: What is the meaning of the interpretation of sandalwood in a dream in different situations?

preview.html: Through this article, you can see the interpretation of sandalwood in a dream in detail from the encyclopedia. In our daily lives, we see many dreams that include mysterious symbols that we do not understand, but our curiosity increases to know their interpretation, which fluctuates between praiseworthy and hateful interpretations, depending on the circumstances of this dream in the first place. Shoes in general are among the common visions that we see in dreams on different occasions, whether when buying them, wearing them, or in their type. Such as sandalwood, and because dream interpretation is a complex science that requires the help of scholars and experts in this science, and in the following lines we will explain to you what dream interpreters said about this vision. Interpretation of sandalwood in a dreamDream interpretation scholars have reported that sandalwood in a dream carries multiple interpretations, including that it indicates the passage of Changes in the dreamer's life, in addition to this dream, is that the dreamer wants to change his life for the better. In the case of seeing old sandals in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is going through a great experience in his life in which he receives a helping hand from someone around him to overcome it. In the case of dreaming of new sandals This is one of the unwanted dreams that indicate a financial crisis. If the dreamer dreams of broken sandals in a dream, this indicates the need to slow down before making a decision. When the dreamer sees that he is giving sandals to a familiar person in the dream, it shows how much he loves the dreamer. In the event that If one sees finding sandals in a dream, this is one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicates that the dreamer is going through a new stage in his life. When the dreamer sees many pairs of shoes in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is trying to manage his affairs financially. As for wearing sandals in a dream, this is It indicates the arrival of a beautiful event in his life, and the symbol of this dream for a person is an official engagement, and God knows best. When you see sandalwood disappearing in a dream, this means that the dreamer is facing problems in his family environment. Seeing sandalwood in a dream expresses undesirable qualities in the dreamer It is represented by a lack of clarity and honesty with those around him. The most prominent color of the sandal that symbolizes his righteousness is white sandalwood. When the dreamer sees a dead person wearing sandals in a dream, this indicates the comfort of that dead person in his grave and his good position in the afterlife. Sandalwood in a dream for a manIf a married man sees in Dreaming that he is repairing shoes with holes, this indicates the dreamer’s good condition and good personality. As for a single person, sandalwood is one of the dreams that express engagement and marriage. If he sees sandals that he loves in a dream, this is good news for a marriage that will bring him happiness, and it is also an indication of marriage to a girl with attractive beauty. On the contrary, if the sandals appear in a bad appearance that the dreamer does not like, this indicates marriage to a girl who does not suit him, which will cause him problems, and God knows best. In general, if a man sees himself in a dream wearing sandals, this means that he is going through changes in his life, represented by his obtaining a new job opportunity abroad, and God knows best. Seeing sandalwood falling in a dream for a married person indicates

title: Interpretation of the leg in a dream for a single woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the following article: Interpretation of a man in a dream for a single woman, through the Encyclopedia Girls sometimes have this vision, and it is one of the main organs in the human body known as the limbs that they depend on in standing and walking, or an accident occurs that results in a loss, God forbid. And when you see one foot in a dream, it depends The interpretation depends on many things, including whether what he saw was his right foot or his left, in addition to the fact that the dreamer’s interpretation of whenever he sees this dream is one of the things that must be taken into account when developing his interpretation, and accordingly we present to you the repercussions of this vision in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of a man in a dream for a single woman in The following points we will tell you the interpretation of a dream for a girl who is not yet married: Feeling tingling and pain in the leg indicates goodness and progress in life with what she will try to achieve in goals. It symbolizes seizing prestigious positions through which one gains power and status. Cutting her toenails shows her interest By appearing in the best way in front of those around her and not standing in a place where someone might misunderstand her. Interpretation of seeing white legs in a dream for a single woman: A beautiful white leg in a dream indicates the soonest date of marriage to a wealthy young man with whom she will live happily. The white leg symbolizes the degree to which she stands in herself, Which is reflected in the treatment of others and the respect and appreciation they have for her. Wearing nail polish in a dream shows the extent of her self-care and confidence in the decisions she makes in her life. Interpretation of a wound in the right leg in a dream for a single woman. An injury to the right leg indicates something bad for her or for a relative of her guardians and guardians. God forbid. This dream may indicate the loss of a desire that she wanted but could not achieve, which will cause her great sadness. Interpretation of toes in a dream for a single woman: Toes in a dream represent the way a person lives and the path he takes in his time, which we will explain in the following points Loss of a leg indicates the loss of purpose, ambition, and hope in obtaining what the dreamer desires. A wound in one of the toes shows the mother’s concern for her future and the decisions she must make about it. Seeing a single woman indicates that someone is holding her toes, which indicates that There are those who care about her and seek to reassure her, and God knows best. Here we have reached the end of our article in which we presented to you everything that dream interpretation scholars mentioned about seeing an unmarried woman, a girl who has not yet been married, advancing in her sleep with all its connotations of good and evil. The bad evil that this vision brings. It mainly depends on what she sees in her dream in her real life, but these interpretations are just personal interpretations that are subject to right and wrong, and to interpret another dream, you can enter through the direct application of dream interpretation.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a herd of cows in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a herd of cows in a dream: Seeing a herd of cows in a dream is one of the visions that jurists differ regarding the connotations it conveys. This vision carries many connotations and symbols that vary according to the number of ideas, including the color of the cow. It can be yellow, black, white, or red, and the cow can be fat or thin. What concerns us in this article is to mention all the cases in which we see a herd of cows. In a dream. The most important interpretations of seeing a herd of cows in a dream. A herd of cows in a dream. Seeing cows represents prosperity, status, abundance of prosperity, a high profit rate, and a high level of food security and fertility. Seeing a herd of cows indicates a predetermined goal and clarity means that the person is used to achieving his goals and taking steps. Constant to reach all desired goals. If a person sees a cow with horns, this indicates a disobedient wife or disputes that may arise in marital life due to stubbornness and excessive emotions. If the fortuneteller sees that he is milking this cow, but he was unable because the cow prevented him, this is a sign of disobedience. A woman for her husband, and the hardening of her figure. If one sees that he is leading a herd of cows, this expresses status, control, occupying a high position, and achieving a great goal. The vision from this point of view is a warning of the necessity of sound leadership and that the person does not use his position to direct others to wrong paths. Whoever dreams that he finds a herd of cows on his way, this indicates great benefit from a person of status, honor, and prestige. However, if he sees that the herd scratches or harms him, this symbolizes that he will be exposed to a serious health problem or a serious illness. In short, seeing cows is An indication of the abundance of goodness and full living, and the blessings and good deeds that bring benefit and benefit to all people. A herd of cows in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of seeing cows, says that this vision symbolizes the years or period of time that will follow a very important event. Seeing a cow also expresses The woman. As for this woman’s behavior and morals, they are interpreted according to the appearance of the cow. If she is fat and milky, this indicates a woman from whom others benefit, and she is a reason to provide assistance to those who need it. If the cows are thin, this symbolizes a weak woman who lives In extreme poverty and do not benefit others. And if a person sees a herd of cows and buys some of them, this indicates his high position, high position, and position that allows him to achieve all his goals. And whoever sees that he is riding in the herd, this indicates many blessings, abundance of goodness, high status, and benefit from the Lord. Or benefiting from an honest man, the death of sorrows and worries, and freedom from dangers and evils. But if he sees a cow that has horns and eats it, there is no good in it, and the vision indicates loss and loss, so the person may lose his job, his status, and the command he previously received. If the person is a farmer and sees a herd of cows This indicates Azd

If the person is a farmer and sees a herd of cows This indicates Azd

title: Interpretation of a dream about onions by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meaning of onions for single women, pregnant women, and divorced women, whether they buy white, green, red, dried cut, peeled, etc. By Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of onions in a dream: Seeing onions in a dream shows a lot of goodness and food, and the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the effects and details of seeing onions in the dream. Whoever sees that he ate onions in a dream, it is bad for him, and onions in a dream are interpreted as bad words and money. It is forbidden, and whoever is sick and dreams that he eats onions will die. Whoever sees onions in a dream and eats them, it is harmful to him, and whoever dreams that he is peeling onions will flatter someone. Whoever sees in his dream that he is peeling onions with tears in his eyes from its smell will be surpassed by his competitors. Onions: Whoever sees it and does not He eats from it, it is good, but if he eats from it, it is bad. If you see a quantity of onions in your dream, then you will face envy and jealousy from others as the price for your success. If you dream that you eat onions, you will defeat all your opponents. If you see a field of green onions in your dream, this means that you will find competition from others in Work, but you feel happy about it. As for seeing cooked onions in your dream, this means peace and tranquility and that you will receive small profits from your trade. If you dream that you cut onions and feel its spicy smell entering your eyes, this means that your competitors will defeat you. Jaafar Al-Sadiq said: Interpretation Dreaming of eating onions has three aspects: forbidden money, sins, and remorse. If you see an amount of onions in your dream, then you will face envy and jealousy from others as the price for your success. If you dream that you are eating onions, you will defeat all your opponents. If you see a field of green onions in your dream, it means that you will find competition from others at work, but you feel happy about it. As for seeing cooked onions in your dream, this means peace and tranquility. The meaning of onions in a dream. Some dream interpreters believe that seeing onions in a dream indicates a lot of money, abundant goods, and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in his life. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he ate a lot of onions and was sick, then this It means that the pain, fatigue, and anxiety will disappear and he will soon recover from the disease and enjoy good health. As for the one who dreams of eating onions after cooking or baking, this means that he is a pious person, devoting himself to obedience to God Almighty, and always aware of the path of truth. And onions are those who hate the Almighty’s saying, “And their onions.” It is said that it shows the emergence of hidden things, like all legumes with a bad smell, it could be money, and peeling an onion shows flattery towards a man. Interpretation of a dream about onions in a dream by Nabulsi: In a dream, it is a bad sign for the one who ate it, so whoever sees that he ate an onion and got sick will die, and green onions will benefit With troubles, many of them show the health of the body sadly. And separation, and if the sick person eats a lot of onions in his dream, he will be cured of his illness, and whoever sees onions and does not eat of them, then it is good, and if he eats of them, then it is bad. As for Ibn Shaheen, it is complete: Al-Kirmani said: It is interpreted as forbidden money and bad words, and if the dreamer is good, then it It is interpreted as kindness and religion, even if it is not good. Refers to collecting illicit money. And eat

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about harassing Ibn Sirin’s relatives?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about harassment from relatives: Seeing harassment from relatives is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and fear in the dreamer, and it has many interpretations, but most often the correct interpretation leads to the presence of exploitative people in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about harassment from relativesWhen the dreamer sees that a member of his family is harassing her in a dream, this means It symbolizes that she will receive personal attention or material assistance from her. Harassment by relatives in a dream could be an indication of some disagreements due to heredity, and seeing that a relative who is not close to the dreamer is harassing him, this means that he wants to help and get close to them to achieve a benefit. Especially for him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that a relative is trying to get close to him, this may indicate his desire to do forbidden things with him to make her reputation bad. It is possible that harassing a relative in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s weak character and inability to obtain his legal rights. Because of his weakness. Interpretation of a dream about harassment by relatives according to Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees in a dream harassment by relatives, this means that he will obtain a lot of forbidden money through corrupt and forbidden actions. This vision also symbolizes that the viewer may obtain a right that is not his, as It may be inherited by others. When a girl sees that one of her relatives is trying to harass her in a dream, this is a sign that he is trying to harm her in different ways. Harassment from relatives is an indication that the family is speaking bad and untrue words about the dreamer. Ibn Sirin sees in this dream a sign that the behavior of the dreamer is inappropriate and that it is harming him. Interpretation of a dream about harassment from relatives to single people: Harassment by a girl’s relatives may indicate that a family member wants to propose marriage to her. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream that a member The family has harassed her, this symbolizes that he is a fraudster who is deceiving her in the name of love in order to deprive her of her personal rights. It is possible that the dream of harassment indicates that he will go on the wrong path and commit many sins, and he must ask God for forgiveness and repent for them. If he is the person who is abusing the girl An aunt or uncle, for example, this may lead to a break in the relationship and kinship and many disputes between them. A dream about a girl being harassed can be a sign of many family pressures and problems. Interpretation of a dream about harassment by a married woman’s relativesWhen a married woman sees that a man from the family is harassing her Or rapes her, this is a sign that she is jealous of her relationship with her husband and wants to divorce him. If a woman sees in a dream that one of her forbidden relatives is mistreating her, this indicates necessary interference in her personal affairs, and this is not true. A woman’s dream of being harassed by her relatives means that this The relative is trying to trap her and her husband so that their marriage leads to separation. Seeing someone harassing a married woman is a sign that he will obtain money that is not his right. A woman’s dream in a dream that a family member is harassing her indicates that she will suffer from serious injustice from this person. .

title: Interpretation of seeing adding coffee in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of adding coffee in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq through the vision website Roy2a.com. In fact, adding coffee is one of the most important drinks served to guests, and seeing adding coffee in a dream can indicate goodness, or it can be a warning or warning of the emergence of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of adding coffee, whether for single women, married women, pregnant women, or divorced women. With the different meanings of Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing adding coffee in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing adding coffee in a dream can indicate comfort and happiness or fatigue and trouble. Seeing yourself drinking coffee in a dream seems like you are going through a lot of problems and difficulties. Dreaming of pouring coffee in a dream is evidence of psychological distress and inability to make decisions. I see myself drinking coffee away from people. A symbol of travel and nutrition. Seeing yourself drinking saffron coffee with a fortune-teller friend is a sign that the dreamer gets a lot of good thanks from its owner. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cup of coffee Or tea in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing coffee served in a dream: Seeing coffee being served to a group of people is a sign of the fortune teller’s status among them in addition to his superiority over them. A person sees a girl he knows offering him coffee in his sleep and he signs marriage with her. A man sees a girl he does not know offering him coffee. It is a sign of the fortune teller’s spending money. Serving coffee in a merchant’s dream is a symbol of success and profit. What is the interpretation of serving coffee in a dream to a single woman: Seeing coffee served in a single woman’s dream is good news for someone whose engagement or wedding is approaching. Seeing a single girl serving coffee to someone she knows, details of his engagement to her. A girl dreams of serving coffee to someone when Being angry or sad is a sign of the end or failure of a relationship in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing boiling coffee in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of drinking coffee with milk? Seeing yourself drinking coffee with milk in a dream indicates the dreamer’s diligence and efforts to reach his dreams and goals. Dreaming of drinking coffee with milk is evidence of happiness and the emergence of Goodness and livelihood. What is the interpretation of a dream about offering coffee to someone: A dream about offering coffee to someone is an example of hospitality, welcome, and generosity. Seeing coffee for someone in a pregnant woman’s dream is approaching childbirth. Offering coffee to a friend in a dream is a sign of something good that brings the fortuneteller and his friend together. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cup of coffee in a dream. Pouring coffee in a dream: I saw myself pouring coffee in a dream. It indicates giving alms and helping the poor and needy. Pouring coffee in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of a male birth. Dreaming of pouring coffee in a dream. It indicates the illustrious position of the pioneer and the emergence of many means of livelihood. Coffee beans. In a dream: Seeing coffee beans for a married woman is a sign of stability in marital life and the end of problems. Coffee beans in a dream symbolize the passage of insight into crises and difficulties. See also: Interpretation of seeing a farewell or cup reader in a dream. We are pleased on the site to see the reception

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. There are many people who dream of strange dreams that convey anxiety and tension in their hearts, and they need its correct interpretation, including the dream of seeing harassment. Bad Content: Scholars differed in the interpretation of this dream due to the state in which the dreamer was in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Harassment is considered one of the bad behaviors that has spread greatly in societies around the world with the spread of the Internet, and there are many people who see harassment in a dream They want to know its interpretation, as many interpretations have appeared, which are as follows: If a person sees in a dream that a stranger is harassing him, this indicates that there are many traitors in his life. If a woman sees in her sleep a dream of harassment, this indicates the tension and discomfort that she feels. In its grains. A dream about harassment generally indicates the dreamer’s fear of the coming days. But if one sees a dream about harassment of stealing money, this indicates the country and the evil that he will be exposed to. While if a man sees a dream that someone he does not know is harassing him, this is evidence of fatigue and discomfort that He faces it in his relationship with others. Interpretation of the dream of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman: The dream of seeing harassment in a dream is considered one of the most common dreams among people, which carries many interpretations and explanations, which vary depending on the situation of the viewer. Single girl: If a girl dreams of being harassed by a stranger in her dream, this indicates problems and issues that she will face in her life. If an unmarried girl dreams of being harassed by someone she knows and she is happy about it, this may indicate bad morals. As for If the suitor sees himself abusing the girl, this indicates his bad morals and that he is deceiving the girl. In general, if an unmarried girl sees that she is being harassed in a dream, this means that she is being exposed to bad and bad words from the people around her. But if she sees that her brother is abusing her, this indicates However, she will suffer from a bad disease in her body. When an unmarried girl sees herself being harassed by an ugly person and becomes angry with him, this is evidence of the suffering and distress that the girl is exposed to at the hands of her family. Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream for a married woman, For a single woman, for a divorced woman, it differs from that of a divorced woman, but in general it shows the evil to which the fortuneteller and his interpretations of this dream will be exposed. As follows: When a married woman dreams of being harassed in a dream and she is satisfied with it, this indicates the woman’s bad ways. However, if the woman works in reality and sees this dream, this indicates that she is not comfortable in her work. Seeing a dream about harassment in a dream, and the harasser was one of Incest for a woman, this is evidence of the sadness and anguish that befalls the woman in reality. While if a married woman sees that someone she knows has harassed her, this is evidence that evil people are entering her home. A wife who sees a dream that a woman is harassing her husband indicates the woman’s concern for her and

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big baby

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a big child in a dream Some dreams may make you feel anxious, so we learn about the interpretation of a dream about a big child in a dream and what it means according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters.Interpretation of a dream about a big child in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a big child in a dream We did not find specific meanings for the vision. However, Seeing an ugly child in a dream could be a sign of anxiety and sadness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an ugly child, this may lead to crises and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an ugly child, this may lead to crises to which he will be exposed, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams is that my child has lost me. In a dream, the interpretation of a dream in which I lost my child in a dream could be a sign of missing a great opportunity, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the loss of her young child, she may move to her place in her husband’s heart, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the loss of a son, it may express sadness, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When she sees the loss of a son, he may That would be a sign of anxiety, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my child getting married in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my child is getting married in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a husband as a child can lead to prestige and power, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees marrying a child in his dream, he may This is a sign of a bright future, and God knows best. It can also express work and profit, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that my child was kidnapped in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son being kidnapped in a dream. Kidnapping a son could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees his son being kidnapped from Before an unknown person, this may lead to things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees a stranger kidnapping her son, this may lead to evil that befalls her wife and her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my child died in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my son died in a dream. The death of a son can indicate salvation from Enemies, God willing. When you see the death of a child, it can lead to trouble and judgment, and God knows the unseen. The death of a child can also reflect wrong decisions, and God knows the unseen, while the death of a son may indicate that the enemies’ machinations have been thwarted by God’s grace, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that My child is sick in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my child is sick in a dream. A child’s illness can be a sign of difficulties, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a sick child can express exposure to injustice, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a sick child who is not one of her children, this may be a sign of distress and worsening of her financial condition. And God knows the unseen. Seeing a sick child in a dream can express some unpleasant things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my child talking in a dream. Interpretation of the dream that my child talks in a dream could be a sign of his long life, and God knows the unseen. It can also be said that he is one of those who speak and advise people, and God knows best. Unseen When you see an infant talking to a sinner in a dream, this may be a sign of good health, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees a child

title: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair with a hair dryer by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about combing hair with a hairdryer: A dream about washing or ironing is one of the dreams that many people see in their dreams, the most important of which is the desire for that. Interpretation of dreams about combing hair with a hairdryer is a very strange dream. Many interpreters differed as to whether the hair in the dream was long or short, as well as whether The hair was thin or curly, and they also differed as to whether it was an unmarried girl, pregnant, divorced, or married. Interpretation of dreams Drying hair in a dream Ibn Sirin’s dream for womenMany people dream of doing their hairVariousHis interpretation will be recognized: Ibn Sirin interprets that if someone sees that he is combing and combing And his hair was long, this indicates that this person will obtain good and abundant money. If one sees that he is combing his hair and that he has short hair, this indicates that he will gain a lot of knowledge and will rise in positions. Seeing someone combing his hair with a wooden comb indicates that he is afraid. Very envious. Perhaps also the interpretation of dreams about combing hair with a hair dryer. For a single woman and she was suffering from a cold, it showed that she was suffering from stress and anxiety in the coming days or that she was mentally and physically tired. As for whoever sees that he received a gift and it was a silver comb, it is considered a sign of He obtained a lot of money. Seeing a married woman combing the hair of a young woman in a dream and she was happy is evidence that she will fulfill her desire, and she will obtain it, which is happiness and peace of mind. An unmarried woman dreamed that she was combing her hair with a plastic comb. This interprets the emergence of lice from the hair while combing it with an iron comb. The appearance of a harmful enemy in the life of an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair with a hairdryer by Ibn Sirin for men. Interpretation of dreams about combing hair with a hairdryer. If a man sees that he is giving his wife a wooden comb, this indicates that his wife will soon become pregnant. A person’s vision indicates that he is combing his hair with difficulty and his hair is curly. This is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and fears in his life. If someone sees that he is combing his hair easily, this is a sign that he will achieve many of the goals he seeks. Seeing a student combing his hair with a plastic comb is a sign of effort and success. Interpretation of a dream Ibn Shaheen combing hair with a hairdryerInterpretation of dreams about combing hair with a hairdryerIbn Shaheen explained the vision of combing hair as showing happiness in life and showing a lot of goodness and getting rid of anxiety, sadness and worries in life. Dreaming of combing hair with a golden comb is a sign of hearing good news that will make the dreamer happy It indicates that you will have a good chance in life. Seeing the hair was short means that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge and gain an excellent position. Seeing the hair combed and the hair tangled, this vision indicates that you are facing a lot of worries and problems. To see the hair tangled but the visionary was able To untangle it, means correct thinking and happiness. Seeing long hair is a sign of increasing money, happiness and healing for the sick and marriage for single people. Seeing the beard removed is considered evidence

title: Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing crying in a dream Crying over someone who died Crying intense tears Crying in a dream in the voice of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of crying: It is joy. Meanings of sadness, anxiety, anguish, and intense crying, with or without tears, for an unmarried, married, or pregnant girl, according to Ibn Sirin. There are many people who sleep and dream that they are crying in a dream, and when they wake up they are disturbed by this dream. Usually, the person is sad before sleep, so he dreams that he is crying, and there are interpretations. Regarding the dream of crying, psychological interpreters said that the dream of crying is not related to the events of the dream itself, but to real events. He cannot express it in reality, here the subconscious mind tries to achieve emotional and mental balance for the person with the aim of getting rid of negative energy and getting out of the state of sadness, and therefore crying is a state of sadness for us in reality that it continues for a long time without exaggerating it, and if a person dreams of seeing another person He is crying, this indicates that there is a state of despair and disappointment. The translator Ibn Sirin came and had a different interpretation of the dream, which is crying in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that whoever dreams that he is crying in a dream, this indicates the entry of joy and goodness into reality, but this The interpretation is not general, that is, if someone dreams that he is crying, but in a loud voice and being slapped, this indicates that there is a misfortune in the family and great sadness, and Ghaben Sirin said that the person is crying. In a dream about tears, it indicates comfort and sometimes the destruction of fears, because it indicates longevity. I dream that I am crying.. Negativity wants to be released: Dreaming of crying means emptying negative emotions that may have been caused by a situation in reality and not the events of the dream itself. Meaning, you are supposed to cry in a dream about something in reality and not about an event in the dream itself. Dreaming about crying can be a way to regain some emotional balance as well as get rid of fears and frustration. In your daily life, you may tend to ignore, deny, or suppress your feelings. Interpretation of crying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. According to Al-Nabulsi in the dream interpretation of the dream of crying: If in the dream there is a scream, a slap, a black dress, or a tear in the pocket, this indicates sadness, and if the crying is from fear. From God Almighty, or to hear the Qur’an, or repentance from a past sin, as it indicates joy and happiness and the disappearance of worry and misery, and indicates fear or rain upon the one who falls. From it when needed and may indicate a long life. Perhaps it indicates an increase in monotheism if God Almighty or Glory be to Him is mentioned. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen also interpreted the dream of crying in a dream: Whoever sees that he is crying without crying, then he will be freed from worry and anxiety. No tears came out of his eyes, as he was not Mahmoud. Death, grief, or slander, and whoever sees: as if people grieved for God who died and their clothes were torn and dust was on their heads, then this ruler mistakes the authority. If he sees that he died and they are crying after his funeral without mourning, then they see happiness from that master. And he does not come out of it

Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen also interpreted the dream of crying in a dream: Whoever sees that he is crying without crying, then he will be freed from worry and anxiety. No tears came out of his eyes, as he was not Mahmoud. Death, grief, or slander, and whoever sees: as if people grieved for God who died and their clothes were torn and dust was on their heads, then this ruler mistakes the authority. If he sees that he died and they are crying after his funeral without mourning, then they see happiness from that master. And he does not come out of it
